row.process:
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" @echo off :CASE "UNIX"
:OTHER : STOP NOMSG, 50, "Unknown Platform" :ENDSWITCH !-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "User" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Password" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_PROVISIONING.PRV.STORE", "PROVISIONINGTOOL.JAR", C, N !------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :DEFINE &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, string
:SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, '"&UC4RB_RM_USERNAME#" ') :SET &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#, '"&UC4RB_RM_PASSWORD#" ')
:SET &UC4RB_JAVA_CLASS# = "ARATokenBase64 encode" ! Invoking java binary java -jar "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#provisioning-tool.jar" &UC4RB_JAVA_CLASS# &UC4RB_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
:SWITCH &$PLATFORM# :CASE "WINDOWS" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS :CASE "UNIX" :INCLUDE PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_SHELL_CMD@UNIX :ENDSWITCH
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** GET AUTHENTICATION KEY ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** GET AUTHENTICATION KEY ACTION FAILED ********"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_PROVISIONING.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process:
:SET &result# = "" :SET &UC4RB_RM_AUTHORIZATION_KEY# = "" :SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"Encoded:*") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#,"Encoded: ")
: IF &pos# > 0 : SET &pos# = &pos# + 9 : SET &line# = MID(&line#,&pos#) : SET &result# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : PSET &UC4RB_RM_AUTHORIZATION_KEY# = &result# : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS
